title: Custom Actions
description: Create, customize and manage custom cards with custom scripts, actions.

subitems.label: Create custom action cards with unique icons and accent colors.
Configure cards to run executables, open browsers, and execute terminal commands.
Chain multiple actions such as running scripts, opening files, and launching applications.
Organize and categorize cards for easy access across different sections.
Personalize card appearance with a variety of icons and a full-spectrum color picker.
Define custom URLs to open automatically with options for immediate or delayed launch.
Assign cards to multiple categories including Pinned, Recently Used, and generation-specific tabs.
Reorder and manage execution sequences with a drag-and-drop interface.
